description: ACM Laboratoire Vitix Food Supplement Tablets is a food supplement in the form of tablets with nutrients that prevent oxidative stress. It features a patented melon extract with a group of vitamins (C, E, B9, and B12) and minerals (Selenium, Copper, and Zinc). Vitamin C, vitamin E, Copper, and Selenium help protect cells from oxidative stress. That being said, has a positive impact on conditions with a direct link to hyperpigmentation or depigmentation, particularly vitiligo. Thus, the intake of this group of nutrients promotes even and bright skin with long-lasting effects.
how_to_use:
How to use
Take one daily tablet of ACM Laboratoire Vitix Food Supplement Tablets with a meal. In case of pregnancy, consult with a healthcare professional before starting the intake of the supplement.

description: Martiderm Pigment Zero DSP-Antiox Capsules is a food supplement that helps to reinforce the skin's natural defenses against the harmful effects of the solar radiation. With a unique combination of antioxidants, it helps to scavenge free radicals that induce photoaging by attacking the DNA. The skin is better prepared to handle intense solar exposure after one month of using this supplement. Please note that this does not replace proper sun protection with a sunscreen.
how_to_use:
How to use
Take one Martiderm Pigment Zero DSP-Antiox Capsules a day with one of the main meals. It is recommended that the treatment begins in Spring and is started at least one month prior to intense solar exposure. This food supplement does not replace proper sun protection with a sunscreen.

description: Martiderm Acniover Capsules Acne-Prone Skin helps to prevent acne outbreaks on skins prone to that condition. This food supplement has been formulated based on the knowledge that what goes inside of you matters to the look of your skin, especially considering imbalances that come from taking oral medications against acne and that the intestinal flora is directly correlated to the skin condition. With a combination of several probiotics that help to rebalance your from within, this supplement is the first step to preventing acne outbreaks.
how_to_use:
How to use
Take one capsule of Martiderm Acniover Capsules Acne-Prone Skin daily with one of the main meals.

description:
Martiderm Amatist Capsules x60 is a food supplement specifically formulated to tackle the concerns of mature skin. Specifically during menopause, the skin is drastically affected by hormonal variations and, in turn, it's subjected to some changes itself. All in all, skin undergoing the menopause transition tends to be thinner, dull, and dry, while also being more prone to develop wrinkles, dark spots, and loose firmness. With this in mind, this supplement has a unique formula that aims to improve the skin's health but also your physical and mental health. Firstly, these capsules feature Hyaluronic acid that improves skin hydration, and Astaxanthin with antioxidant properties. Secondly, a vitamin complex comprising several vitamins such as vitamin A, vitamin D, or vitamin C, offers a multitude of benefits.
Thirdly, the formula features Sensoril®, which comes from Ashgwanda. This adaptogen improves vitality, reinforces the immune system, and helps reduce stress and fatigue. As a result, this supplement helps reduce menopausal symptoms, improve your physical and mental well-being as well as maintain the health of the skin and the osteoarticular system.
how_to_use:
How to use
Take one capsule from Martiderm Amatist Capsules x60 in the morning with a full glass of water.

description: LETI SR Food Supplements Capsules is a food supplement in a capsule format that provides the appropriate nutrients for sensitive skin prone to redness. People with sensitiveness and facial redness should have a healthy and light diet, rich in vitamins C and B. Moreover, the intake of LETI SR Food Supplements Capsules will improve the function of the topical applications of the SR line treatments. In fact, this supplement is suitable for individuals with coeliac disease, and people with lactose intolerance. In detail, these capsules contain fish proteins and soy lecithin. Another key point is that does not contain a source of phenylalanine.
how_to_use:
How to use
Take two capsules of LETI SR Food Supplements Capsules a day during meals, as a complement to a varied diet, for a minimum of two months. Not recommended during pregnancy or breastfeeding. Not recommended in the event of hypersensitivity or allergy to any component of the formula.

description:
Martiderm The Originals Proteos Capsules is a nutritional supplement that provides your skin the nutrients it needs to maintain a youthful appearance. With a unique composition, with Glycosaminoglycans as a star ingredient, this supplement provides both hydration and firmness to the skin. Glycosaminoglycans are a part of Proteoglycans that are naturally present in the skin. Having the ability to hold water in the tissues they are essential to provide hydration, elasticity, and firmness to the skin. Because it also contains Hyaluronic Acid it helps reduce fine lines and wrinkles. Hyaluronic Acid can retain moisture due to its ability to bind up to 10.000 times its own weight in water. This not only keeps the skin hydrated but also plumps it up. In addition, the presence of Vitamin C helps build up collagen, essential to our skin, improving its appearance.
In essence, these capsules will provide an antiaging action by deeply hydrating the skin. By improving moisturization, they will keep your skin hydrated and plumped helping you achieve rejuvenated and firmer skin.
how_to_use:
How to use
Take 1 capsule of Martiderm The Originals Proteos Capsules preferably in the morning, along with your meal and a large glass of water.

description: Noreva Lipoleum Atopic Capsules adopts a normalizing effect on the very dry to atopic skin. As atopic skin usually presents a dysfunctional skin barrier as well as a dysregulated immune system, the active ingredients of this supplement are helpful in the management of the condition. Enriched with vitamin D and vitamin E, this product both helps stabilize the immune system as well as improves the skin resilience against environmental factors such as temperature, UV radiation, and general pollution.
how_to_use:
How to use
Take 1 or 2 Noreva Lipoleum Atopic Capsules per day during meals. If necessary, cut the end of the capsule and dilute the content in food. Use 1 to 2 months renewable. This product should not be used as a substitute for a varied as well as a balanced diet and a healthy lifestyle. Do not exceed the recommended daily dose. Please take into consideration that this supplement contains fish gelatin in its composition. Do not take this supplement if you are allergic (hypersensitive) to any of its ingredients. In case of coagulation disorders, consult your doctor before taking this supplement. If you are pregnant or breastfeeding, consult your doctor before taking this supplement.

description: Noreva Reducol MD acts on the skin renovation process, promoting its regeneration. Formulated as monodoses gel capsules, this product allows an easy and safe application. Thank to its active ingredients such as the oxygenated glycerol triester, prevents and/or reduces the formation of keloid, and hypertrophic scars. Additionally, these capsules can be used on scars from general injuries and cosmetic or surgical procedures as well as palmoplantar fissures and also on skin affected by external aggressions. Moreover, it is suitable for the whole family (infants, children, and adults).
ingredients:
Main Ingredients

Oxygenated glycerol triester provides a healing/restructuring/anti-inflammatory action, thus preventing the appearance of keloid and hypertrophic scars;
how_to_use:
How to use

Scars from injuries and cosmetic or surgical procedures, apply one Noreva Reducol MD capsule daily, after a completed physiologic cicatrization;
Palmoplantar fissures and on skin affected by external aggressions, apply one Noreva Reducol MD capsule daily directly on the fissure or affected area.

On both types of lesions, please gently massage the treated area after the application, until completely absorbed. Daily use, until total smoothing of the edges of the scar.

description:
Lashilé Beauty Good Skin Anti-Age Gummies x60 will revolutionize the way you think about anti-aging. Two delightful gummies a day will help you achieve a youthful-looking complexion! In fact, these vitamin-packed treats not only help to fight wrinkles but also gift you with more elastic, firmer skin that radiates vitality. So, the secret behind these gummies lies in their formula. The inclusion of hyaluronic acid helps to promote skin elasticity. As a result, it helps to smooth out wrinkles and enhance the skin's firmness. But that's not all. Vitamin C aids in collagen production, essential for maintaining the skin's strength and youthful elasticity. 
Beyond their benefits, these gummies stand out for their convenience. Whether you're at home, in the office, or on the go, these gummies are a hassle-free addition to your beauty regime. No water is needed – just enjoy them straight from the pack. Additionally, the delightful flavor of Strawberry Candy makes taking your vitamins a tasty treat. Last but not least, these gummies cater to various dietary needs. They are vegan and gluten-free, and also free from any artificial colors. So, complement your daily beauty routine with these gummies!
how_to_use:
How to use
Chew 2 of Lashilé Beauty Good Skin Anti-Age Gummies x60 a day, at your most convenient time. For long-lasting results, it is recommended to take the gummies for a period of 3 to 6 months. After 6 consecutive months of intake, it is recommended to take a 1-month break. Pregnant or breastfeeding women should not take this supplement.

description: Bella Aurora RepigmentSun Solar Capsules consists of capsules integrated in a treatment to mitigate the aesthetic consequences of vitiligo on the skin. In other words, these solar capsules help prepare the skin for sun exposure or phototherapy. Thus, the skin is more protected against possible sunburn and skin damage due to UV light. In this way, the skin is protected from the inside out, but it is still advisable to use a topical sunscreen to increase the skin's protection. Furthermore, each of these capsules contains a combination of Vitamins C and E, making this combo perfect as they provide great photoprotection together. These capsules also contain Zinc, Selenium and Copper, three ingredients that help protect cells from the oxidative damage caused by sun exposure. As a plus, copper also helps to contribute to normal skin pigmentation. Finally, this food supplement does not contain gluten, lactose and is suitable for vegans. Its effectiveness must be added to the Bella Aurora Repigment12 Repigmenting Cream treatment to prepare the skin for sun exposure. Thus, the entire treatment will be more effective and long-lasting without any damage to the skin.
how_to_use:
How to use 
Take one Bella Aurora RepigmentSun Solar Capsules capsule a day with a glass of water during lunch. Do not exceed the recommended daily dose. Its consumption is not recommended during pregnancy or breastfeeding, nor by children. It does not replace a topical sunscreen, which is why it is still recommended to use a sunscreen throughout the treatment.

description: Rosacure Combi Food Supplement Tablets is a food supplement especially suitable for skin with rosacea. With a unique formula, it not only attenuates rosacea symptoms such as burning sensations, itching, and redness but also helps keep the skin in normal conditions. Its star ingredients are MSM, Silymarin, and Zinc. The MSM reduces inflammation. It helps, therefore, to attenuate rosacea symptoms such as burning sensations, itching, and redness. Silymarin, an antioxidant from milk thistle, helps shield the skin against free radicals. And Zinc contributes to the maintenance of normal skin. All in all, this food supplement is a complementary care for those who suffer from rosacea. Combined with other products from the Rosacure range it helps avoid the acute stages of rosacea and keep the skin in normal conditions. The recommendation is of 2 capsules a day in crisis periods and then 1 capsule a day to maintain the results.
how_to_use:
How to use
Take 1 to 2 capsules of Rosacure Combi Food Supplement Tablets in the morning with a full glass of water. The recommendation is of 2 capsules a day in crisis periods and then 1 capsule a day to maintain the results. It is also recommended to take it for at least 3 consecutive months. In order to achieve optimal results, combine with other products from the Rosacure range.
